title: Sabrent 6100mAh High Capacity External Backup Battery Charger Power Bank Charger with Dual USB Port (PB-BCBG)
description: Description:The Sabrent Power Bank High Capacity 6100mAh gives you the ability to charge your iPhone 4 three to four times,Charge your smart phones and tablets at top speed. Max Output 2.1A.Perfect for home use, road trips, long flights, picnics, camping, outdoor parties, BBQs, etc.Features:- Battery Capacity: 6100 mAh- Input: 5.0V/1.5-2A- Output: 5.0V/3.1A（Two USB output Shared)- Charging time: 5.5-6 hoursWhat's in the box?- High Capacity Power Bank (6100mAh)- Micro USB CableWarranty:This product comes with a one year warranty.In order for us to properly assist you, please follow these simple instructions:Go to www.sabrent.com/support and click 'Submit a ticket'.Submit your ticket.You must include your Amazon Order ID# number in the subject line.
